title: The 7 most famous interpretations of seeing exam failure

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing failure in exams? It indicates some losses that the dreamer faces in his life. The meaning of seeing failure in the second exam? Evidence of the failure he has experienced in his life. What is the interpretation of a dream of failing exams in a pregnant woman’s dream? It indicates an incomplete pregnancy. And being exposed to a miscarriage. The meaning of a dream about failing an exam? Evidence of problems between the girl and her partner. What is the interpretation of a dream about failing an exam for a pregnant woman in a dream? Evidence of a full-term pregnancy and healthy fetus lineage. Interpretation of a dream about failing exams. Seeing failure in exams is evidence of fear of some responsibilities. In the life of the fortuneteller. Then a dream about failing an exam may indicate some losses that the dreamer will face in his life. Failing the examination may indicate the loss of the plans drawn up by the fortuneteller. Then someone seeing in a dream that he failed in two subjects, this is evidence of the success and success of these two subjects. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is taking an exam, this is evidence of his marriage in the near future. Whoever dreams of being on the exam board and unable to answer, this symbolizes a lack of self-confidence. Then failing the second exam is evidence of the failure he will experience in his life. Then the dream indicates Failing an exam leads to stress and anxiety. Seeing an individual failing an exam. Failure in an individual exam can indicate the failure of a romantic relationship. Hence, failing an exam is evidence of problems between the girl and her partner. A dream about failing an exam for a pregnant woman An exam failure can indicate in a woman’s dream Pregnant woman to incomplete pregnancy and miscarriage. Failure in the test may indicate difficulty in childbirth for the pregnant woman. Seeing a dream about a man failing. If a man sees in a dream that he cannot answer the exam and fails it, this indicates the presence of problems and the appearance of some hateful people in his life. Then seeing Not being able to answer the test is evidence that the situation has stopped, as the dreamer must draw closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of the dream of the Nabulsi exam: Failing in an exam when you see it in a dream is evidence that you are going through a difficult time full of problems. Then the dream of failing the exams indicates fear It is from this period that the dreamer is going through. Dreaming about failing an exam is an indication of the fear of failure and failure to achieve achievements and success. After that, seeing an exam in a dream and failing it is evidence of the dreamer’s inability to pass some of the problems he faces. After that, it may mean failure In an exam, when you see in a dream that you are taking one of the tests and you are afraid of failing it. Seeing a failure of a pregnancy test. The failure of a pregnant woman’s examination in a dream is evidence that the pregnancy is complete and the fetus is in good health. After that, failing the test may indicate difficulties during childbirth.

title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing wheat in a dream for a man

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing an ear in a dream? Evidence of a good and happy year full of goodness and poverty. What is the meaning of seeing yellow wheat? Evidence of financial success and prosperity. What is the interpretation of seeing a man in a dream cleaning wheat? A sign of getting rid of his sins. Interpretation of seeing wheat harvest in a dream? It indicates To good and happy news. Interpretation of seeing dry wheat in a dream? Proof of a person’s success in obeying God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about wheat by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about wheat in a dream, as Ibn Sirin explains, if it is boiled, it is an indication of luck and love. Seeing ears of corn in A dream is a sign of the dreamer’s progress. Seeing an ear in a dream is evidence of a happy and happy year full of kindness and livelihood. Ears of corn in general can be a sign of marriage and the fulfillment of all desires. Seeing a dream about wheat for a man. Green wheat fields indicate the good condition that the dreamer is experiencing. Seeing a dream about wheat indicates Yellow wheat indicates success and material prosperity. Harvesting wheat in a dream indicates good and happy news that this person will hear. Seeing a man harvesting a field of wheat in a dream is an indication of the fulfillment of desires and goals. Seeing a man in a dream that he is cleaning wheat is a sign of getting rid of the sins he commits. If one sees in his dream that he is carrying a bag of wheat, this means that he will bear many responsibilities. Interpretation of a dream about wheat for a single woman. Seeing wheat in an unmarried girl’s dream may indicate marriage soon and is also an indication of achieving goals and desires. Clean wheat in a girl’s dream is a sign On a short marriage. Seeing a dream with wheat for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she has a bag of wheat, this is evidence that her children are good. Seeing black grains of wheat is a warning to take necessary care of her children. If she sees a grain of wheat in a dream and does not have children, she will become pregnant soon. Interpretation of a dream Wheat for pregnant womenWheat in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates goodness, especially if the wheat grains are in large quantities, and it is also an indication of good health. A lot of wheat in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the health of the fetus. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is picking wheat and reaping it, this is evidence On the upcoming date of birth.Seeing a dream about wheat for NabulsiSeeing him eating wheat in a dream is evidence that he is a successful person in his obedience to God Almighty.Wet wheat in a dream is an indication that the money saved by the dreamer will be subject to scarcity and plunder.Joy in a dreamSee grilled fishShrimps in a dreamLentils in A dream about seeing raw fish. title: Interpretation of a dream about making carpets in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about making carpets in a dream: We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about making carpets in a dream, one of the dreams that many wanted to know the interpretation of this vision. Rather, through diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about making carpets in a dream: Seeing girls laying a carpet in a dream may indicate the permissible ruling that the dreamer may obtain during this period, and God knows best. In the event that one sees making carpets in a dream This may indicate that he is a person who approaches God, Blessed and Almighty, and performs many acts of worship. Seeing a person making carpets may indicate that he is a religious and moral person, thanks to God. Dreaming of years of carpet in a dream may indicate great material gains that the dreamer may acquire during this period. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a green carpet in a dream. Everyone who sees a green carpet in his dream may indicate that he will hear happy news in the coming days, thanks to God. Dreaming of a green carpet in a dream may indicate the marital and family stability that they enjoy during this time, and God knows best. In The condition of the person, the green carpet may indicate the end of a financial crisis that the dreamer has suffered from for a long time. A dream of a green carpet in a man’s dream may indicate that God’s grace will facilitate his affairs and circumstances. Interpretation of a dream of sweeping a carpet in a dream: A person’s dream that he is cleaning carpets may indicate the fulfillment of Desires and dreams, thanks to God. In the case of seeing sweeping carpets in a dream, this may indicate a high position that the dreamer may reach during this period, and God knows best. In the case of seeing sweeping carpets in a dream, it may indicate the unresolved problems and difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life. During this period, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing carpets in a dream indicates a desire to fulfill the dreams and aspirations of the person who had the vision, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about sitting on a carpet in a dream Sitting on carpets in a dream may mean traveling on Umrah or Hajj for the sake of insight, thanks to God. A dream may indicate For a person to say that he was sitting on a folded rug indicates that he is going through a major crisis that will pass for a period of time. If there is a person sitting on the rug in a dream, this may indicate happy dreams that may occur to the visionary in those days, thanks to God. Seeing sitting on the rug in a dream can It indicates the end of the financial problems and debts that the person with the vision was facing in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about urinating on the carpet at home in a dream. Urinating on the carpet in a dream may indicate the actions of the person with bad vision and he must stop it. In the event of seeing urinating on the carpet In a dream inside the house, this may indicate some financial obstacles that the people of the house are facing at that time and they need to seek God’s help. Seeing urinating on the carpets of the house in a dream may indicate some wrong things that the dreamer is doing and that he is ashamed of at that time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about an electric cable according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an electric cable in a dream for a single woman: See the point Power cord In a dream, a single girl leads to many problems and crises that she will be exposed to. It also warns naked women and girls of bad behavior if the wire is exposed. It also indicates the anxiety and fear that this girl is experiencing at this time. If she sees that she is next to an electricity wire, it will lead her to many sins and disobedience. See the spread of wires. This is a warning that there are many evil people near them. But if you see electrical wires without current, this is one of the good visions that indicate feeding the viewer a lot of good and abundant money and bypassing many problems. The crises that she was exposed to in her life. Interpretation of a dream about a cable in a dream. It is called seeing cables. It is a sign that the monarch has made many short trips that have led to belittling his condition and diminishing his status among men. If he sees an old and echoing wire, this explains the sadness and bad mood that the dreamer is in control of, Because he is exposed to many problems and is placed under pressure that affects him and his psyche. It also indicates the state of stress, tension, and psychological disorder that the dreamer is experiencing, because of his bad nature and the failure of those around him to adapt to his style. If the dreamer sees a number of private fences with wires, this vision warns the dreamer that he will be exposed To deceive and deceive and that he will be deceived by some people. Also, seeing a wire indicates that the dreamer is a person with great influence and authority that many people fear. Interpretation of seeing a wire in a dream: Seeing an appointment in the dreamer’s dream generally symbolizes new changes that are occurring in the dreamer’s life. He said Some interpreters say that it refers to the sins and misdeeds that the dreamer commits in his life, and it is one of the warning visions for him to distance himself from the troubles and sorrow in which the dreamer lives. Clean vessels in a dream interpret the dreamer’s good condition and good characteristics. It is also good news for the dreamer of the arrival of happiness, joy and happiness in the dream. The life of the dreamer. Like washing dishes with wires, it shows that he endures hardships and is able to deal with all the pressures and crises that he is exposed to. It symbolizes the date of an unmarried girl’s wedding and heralds the arrival of kindness and plenty of sustenance. Interpretation of a dream about burning electrical cables. Many interpretive scholars said that seeing cables burning is a bad omen. For the fortune teller. It also indicates the emergence of many problems in the viewer’s family life, and in his work environment. It indicates the fear and anxiety that the viewer is exposed to in his life, because he is exposed to a major crisis that will pass. It also explains the worry and sorrow that the dreamer faces and the weight of the world on his heart. It is one of the visions The warning that alerts the viewer and warns him to be careful and preventive during the coming period. However, in the case of controlling fires, your behavior is electric, and this symbolizes the ability to overcome problems and the end of the crises and psychological pressures that he faces. Interpretation of seeing a wire being cut in a dream. Cutting a thread in a married man’s dream is evidence of the problems and disagreements that he faces. He and his wife suffer from it, which leads to divorce. As Yesh

title: Learn about the meanings of the color green in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Green color in a dream Seeing colors may seem somewhat strange. Many of us believe that it does not carry a specific symbol for its interpretation, but dream interpretation lawyers and psychologists have reported many interpretations of seeing colors in a dream. In fact, in this article, I present to you the complete interpretations of seeing the color green. What is the interpretation of seeing the color green in a dream? Seeing the color green in a dream in general is a sign of the dreamer’s religiosity and faith, that he has a vigilant conscience, abstains from forbidden things, and always approaches God. As permissible, it is also considered a symbol of life, nature and stability. Alternatively, some jurists stated that it is considered a warning to the pioneer about what he will face in his life and what he will be exposed to, according to the details of the vision. If he is found in a green meadow, this dream is not considered bad, but it is neutral and symbolizes stability. Whoever sees that he is eating green food, especially if he is eating vegetables, this indicates the dreamer’s quest for comfort, recovery, and happiness. If he loses something in green and searches for it for a long time, this indicates He is looking for peace and comfort, but seeing personal things in this color shows the dreamer’s desire for stability and getting rid of the problems that hinder him. His life. Psychologists have also confirmed that the green color in a dream is a sign of the arrival of spring and good news. It is the color of hope and reassurance and expresses fruitful years and happy days. It also indicates material and cognitive achievements and a sign of success and victory in life. Whoever wears the color green in his dream, stays away from confusion and tension in reality and replaces it with renewal and vitality, because this color has a clear reflection on the psychological state of the dreamer. If the dreamer sees that he dyes his hair this color, this means that he will open a small shop or that he will continue his life without needing anyone, and it is a sign that the dreamer continues his life without difficulties and problems, and freedom from that. Debts. A green tree branch in a dream indicates that a person will live a happy life, he will have a blessed life, he will be satisfied with the situation, he will raise his children in the right way, and in return for his effort, he will receive kindness and faith. Wearing green shoes indicates the dreamer’s focus On moral feelings and a religious lifestyle and may indicate marriage to someone who possesses these qualities. Seeing green pants is a sign of the dreamer’s beliefs and could be a message that you are getting closer to God and doing good deeds. The green color in a dream by Ibn SirinThe green color in a dream by Ibn SirinThe green color is A happy and soothing color to the eye as well, and when seen in a dream, whether it is the clothes the dreamer is wearing, the color of the car or the box, etc., these dreams have different meanings. Interpretations. Ibn Sirin says: Seeing it indicates an increase in diet and its blessings, and whoever sees that he is wearing green clothes, this means reassurance and psychological comfort. This color also indicates the prosperity of the dreamer’s life during the coming period, and seeing

title: Interpretation of running and fear in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of running and fear in a dream In a dream, in case you want to know the interpretation of running and fear in a dream, a dream is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know its interpretation. Therefore, we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some diligent scholars, and not those based on a website that does not include interpretations, but rather conveys the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of running and fear in a dream: Running and fear of something unknown can indicate some of the obstacles that the dreamer faces during those days. In the event that a person sees that he was running and was afraid, this may indicate some turmoil occurring in his life at that time. Anyone who sees in his dream that he was running hard and there was a predatory animal behind him, may indicate feelings of turmoil that the dreamer felt. At that time. In the case of intense running, this may indicate a loss that the person with vision may suffer during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running on the road in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he is running very quickly on the road, this may indicate his many skills and abilities. On success. Running on the road in a dream can mean taking on a great responsibility, thanks to God. If someone saw that he was running in a dream and did not know in which direction, this may indicate that he is afraid of his future and cannot determine his goals. Running on the road in a dream promises Evidence of the great effort and energy that the dreamer has to achieve his dreams. Interpretation of a dream about running in the dark in a dream: Seeing yourself running in the dark in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s desire to isolate himself from others. title: Interpretation of seeing a grave at home in a dream for an unmarried woman?

preview.html: Seeing a grave in the house in a dream Seeing the grave in the house in a dream is one of the visions that requires contraction of the chest. The presence of the grave wherever it is in the dreamer’s dream calls him to extreme fear, so what about the presence of the grave in the house? The vision necessitates him to search for an explanation that will heal his heart, and we will present those interpretations that the dreamer searches for with different details about the vision. Seeing a grave in the house in a dream This vision is one of the visions in which commentators differed in its interpretation. Some of them said that it foretells the death of one of the residents of this house, and some of them said that the fortuneteller was suffering from a bad psychological state due to a loss of confidence in himself and his abilities, which led him to isolate him. By himself, he prefers the feeling of loneliness than dealing with those around him who always remind him of his failure. Interpreting a dream about a grave at home requires a little pessimism, but of course there is still hope in the face of God (Glory be to Him). The owner of the vision awaits him with many problems in his life, and if he seeks to achieve an ambition, he will suffer a lot and will find obstacles in front of him that prevent him from achieving this ambition, but he will overcome all these obstacles. There is another interpretation of this vision. If a woman finds that she lives in the house with a dug grave and cries softly, she will soon become pregnant, but she will suffer a lot to preserve this fetus, which she will eventually be able to do. She gives birth, and happiness returns again to this house that has long suffered from trouble. Seeing her open may indicate that a tragic accident has occurred for the members of the house, and some commentators have said that the dreamer is accompanied by a state of extreme despair due to his inability to achieve his goals in life, which makes him feel He suffers from severe depression and prefers to withdraw from himself and not face the outside society. Interpretation of the view of the grave in Ibn Sirin’s house. Ibn Sirin said that whoever sees that he is digging a grave in his house, many sorrows will surround him, and these sorrows may arise from the many burdens and worries that he carries alone, and the lack of Who shares his concerns? Or comfort him and comfort him. But if he sees in a dream that the grave is changing its location, then the dream indicates that he will build a new house and move to it soon, and the vision also indicates that one of the members of the house will go out or travel a long distance. . A place that will cause family members great sadness. A married woman’s dream indicates the unhappiness she lives in her home, and her suffering from bad morals and character from her husband, who sometimes urges her to divorce him, to save herself from this inappropriate husband. With him. As for the unmarried man, his vision shows his intense need for a person to share his sorrows and joys with him, and that he feels a deadly loneliness that he cannot bear anymore, and he tries to get out of it in various ways, but the weak means material. Do not allow him to suggest to one of the girls that he wants to be his life partner. If the young man who lives in this house wants to leave it and travel far to build his future, then the vision is an indication that his ambitions will be fulfilled abroad and that there will be more sustenance and affection that he will receive. From travel.TV

title: Interpretation of makeup in a dream Seeing makeup in a dream

preview.html: Dream of facial makeup and buying new cosmetics, eyeliner, lipstick for a single girl, married, pregnant, Ibn Sirin, mascara and eyeliner Interpretation of makeup in a dream If you see that you are putting on makeup, this means that you are trying to hide a part of your personality or something in your life We often want to hide something negative, makeup is cosmetic and we use it to improve our appearance and cover obvious flaws. Wearing makeup in a dream also shows that we want to improve ourselves and our image and we also want to boost our self-confidence If you see yourself wearing a lot of makeup in a dream to an excessive degree, this means that you often focus on the external appearance and appearance instead of the essence of things Whoever sees that she has put on makeup or decorations, it is an adornment and happiness for her life If one sees in a dream that he is putting dyes on his face or skin with a great deal of exaggeration or exaggeration, this is its interpretation, that the dreamer deals with his peers or those around him in a rude manner. The dream also indicates a lack of taste, bad behavior and thinking. Whoever sees himself in a dream looking at a woman, he is the one who comes to her wife if she is unmarried, or gives birth to a child if she is married. Putting on a lot of makeup in your dream indicates the mistreatment of those around you and your lack of patience in dealing with them. Also, putting on makeup in your dream indicates that you feel some guilt or deficiency that you seek to compensate for through makeup. And using makeup tools and cosmetics in your dream may reflect the bad intentions that you are trying to hide in reality. Interpretation of makeup or cosmetics in a dream If one sees in a dream that he is putting dyes on his face or skin with a great deal of exaggeration or exaggeration, then this is its interpretation, that the dreamer deals with his peers or those around him. In a rude way. The dream also indicates a lack of taste, bad behavior and thinking. Dreaming of makeup or cosmetics, cosmetics and body care products is the result of two things: The first is that the dreamer feels unwanted, which creates a feeling of deficiency that prompts him to exaggerate when applying cosmetics, especially those that whiten the skin. The second topic is the dreamer's feeling of the need to hide his or her true features or face. In both cases, the dreamer or dreamer seeks to lie as a way of life, but it is a lie that does not harm its owner but rather adorns him or her. Makeup in a dream basically includes the idea of ​​cosmetics or decorations, as the dreamer has to hide his or her psychological flaws through masks, false eyelashes, powders, and others. Makeup in a woman's dream generally indicates her desire to satisfy her psychological needs and her sense of satisfaction and aesthetic balance. Interpretation of makeup and cosmetics in a single dream An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she is putting on makeup, which makes her look more beautiful, radiant and fresh, this means that her lifestyle is based on kindness, which is a good style that always makes her enjoy love and affection. Respect for others. As for the unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she has become ugly or less beautiful after putting on makeup or makeup
